jobDescription: What you’ll be doing... As a member of the Business Intelligence (BI) Group, the individual is responsible for supporting business analytics and project management of the Network Transformation Program and One Fiber Program. A strong foundation in working with R (or Python), structured and unstructured databases, SQL, and Tableau visualization is a prerequisite for this role, to help identify and fulfill customer requirements. The individual will produce professional analytics and visualization that are actionable, timely, and efficiently presented to stakeholders. End to end ownership of analytical reporting including; request evaluation, code development, data analysis, data presentation, key takeaways and delivery of product. Utilization of internal and external data, management of data processing resources, results generation and analysis to provide actionable recommendations. Develop customer reports and dashboards that provide valuable information to stakeholders across the business.Ensure accuracy in data elements, investigate anomalies and ensure corrective action is taken.Provide detailed analysis of metrics data to ensure the teams have the proper information to achieve objectives, and deliver them through expert visualization.Have a strong understanding of wireless, telecom, and customer behaviors. Identify improvement opportunities and work through implementation.What we’re looking for... You'll need to have: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, Operations Research, or related area.Four or more years of relevant work experience.Strong problem solving skills.Proficient in SQL and strong statistical computer languages (R, Python, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.Knowledge in advanced statistical techniques and concepts.Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across functions.A drive to learn and master new technologies. Even better if you have: MS or advanced degree.Experience with AWS.Experience with data management and modeling using KNIME, SAS, MS Suiite or other modeling tools.Creative visualization and dashboard creation skills.When you join Verizon... You’ll be doing work that matters alongside other talented people, transforming the way people, businesses and things connect with each other. Beyond powering America’s fastest and most reliable network, we’re leading the way in broadband, cloud and security solutions, Internet of Things and innovating in areas such as, video entertainment.
